Title: Danfoss Power Solutions releases ACL 4.0, introducing geofencing capabilities to its autonomous control software
Summary: PLUS+1® Autonomous Control Library (ACL) 4.0 enables users to create virtual boundaries around specific geographic areas, which helps ensure reliability and enables location tracking when a machine enters or exits a boundary.

Title: Rising demand for green technologies drives Danfoss to open its largest production facility in China
Summary: Danfoss today inaugurated its largest global production facility in China. Spanning 126,000 sqm, Danfoss’ Haiyan Second Campus more than doubles the company’s presence in the region, underscoring its long-term commitment to supporting China’s green transition and high-quality development.

Title: Early detection, lasting protection: Sine-wave filter monitoring
Summary: Danfoss expands the integrated condition-based monitoring (CBM) capabilities of its premium VLT® drives to include sine-wave filter monitoring. This is especially relevant for applications using capacitors within sine-wave filters. This enhancement provides customers with new insights into equipment health and elevates proactive maintenance strategies.
